verbose_text: Only CHIR-99021 and CHIR-98014 lead to a strong induction of the Wnt / beta-catenin pathway, whereas BIO and SB-216763 showed a minor or no increase in activation of the Wnt / beta-catenin pathway over the natural ligand Wnt3a.
evidence: CHIR-99021 and CHIR-98014 lead to a strong induction of the Wnt/beta-catenin
